typography.installation: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.html: <link href='https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600&family=Manrope:wght@400;500;600;700&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;500&display=swap' rel='stylesheet'>

usage_rules.gradients: Do NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors. Subtle gradients allowed on active states only.
usage_rules.shadows: Use 'shadow-sm' for cards, 'shadow-lg' for dropdowns/modals. Avoid heavy shadows.

grid_systems.file_grid: grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-4 lg:grid-cols-5 xl:grid-cols-6 gap-6

cards.base: bg-white rounded-xl border border-slate-200 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-300
cards.file_card: group relative flex flex-col items-center justify-center p-6 aspect-square bg-white border border-slate-100 hover:border-indigo-200 rounded-xl transition-all cursor-pointer hover:bg-slate-50

inputs.default: h-10 rounded-lg border-slate-300 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 focus:border-primary transition-all bg-white

modals.content: bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-2xl border border-slate-100 p-6 sm:max-w-lg

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Theme: FORCE LIGHT MODE. Do not implement dark mode toggles unless specifically requested in the future. The enterprise vibe requires clean white/slate.
2. Sidebar: Create a collapsible sidebar. Navigation links should have active states (bg-indigo-50 text-indigo-700 font-medium).
3. Breadcrumbs: MUST implementation dynamic breadcrumbs for folder navigation.
4. Context Menu: Implement a custom right-click context menu for files (Open, Share, Rename, Delete).
5. Drag & Drop: Use 'react-dropzone' for the upload area, visual feedback on drag enter is critical (border-indigo-500 border-dashed bg-indigo-50).
6. Tables: Use shadcn 'Table' component for the list view. Add hover states to rows.
7. Testing: Add 'data-testid' to every interactive element. E.g., 'file-item-123', 'upload-button', 'folder-row'.
8. Empty States: Never leave a list empty. Show a friendly illustration and a 'Create New' button.
9. Auth Page: Clean, centered card. No complex background. Just a subtle mesh or simple gradient.
10. File Icons: Use Lucide icons with different colors for file types (PDF=Red, Doc=Blue, Image=Purple, Folder=Yellow/Amber).
